title: Monthly Reflection of MBA Life: October 2025
description: A monthly reflection from an MBA student tracking the ups, downs, and learning curves of business-school life. This update offers candid insight into the day-to-day grind, growth, and mindset shifts that come with navigating MBA challenges and opportunities.

title: AI in Fashion Design Tool [Random Thesis #1]
description: An exploration of vertical AI service opportunities in the fashion design industry. It analyzes how AI can automate technical workflows, unlock new creative tools, and reshape the design-to-production pipeline.

title: Monthly Reflection of MBA Life: November 2025
description: A reflection on building rapid prototypes and the key career advice gathered from mentors across tech, startups, and business. It captures how hands-on experimentation and guidance shaped both product thinking and career direction.
